articles.title: Fortnite login is back after an outage
articles.description: Fortnite players are able to hop into matches following a login issue that Epic Games described as preventing users from “getting in reliably.” “This log-in outage is resolved; all players are able to log-in again across all platforms,” Epic said at 8:54PM ET. “We'll continue monitoring our services to ensure there are no other issues.” […]
articles.author: Jay Peters
